headline: A Bull Market Is Here: 2 Brilliant Stocks Down 35% and 43% to Buy Right Now
summary: Strong corporate earnings, the possibility of another round of tax cuts, and excitement surrounding artificial intelligence (AI) and other tech trends are helping maintain the ongoing rally in the stock market.  Meanwhile, the tech-centric Nasdaq Composite index has climbed 34% across the same period.  Tech giants including Nvidia, Apple, and Microsoft could keep roaring to new highs and help push major indexes to new record levels, but investors shouldn't overlook other high-quality companies that happen to be trading at big discounts at the moment.
